mapper.select: select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.create_time AS "timemills", b.company_name AS "parkName" from order_tb a, com_info_tb b where a.comid = b.id and a.create_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.end_time is NULL ORDER BY a.create_time DESC limit 5

select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.end_time AS "timemills", b.company_name AS "parkName" from order_tb a, com_info_tb b where a.comid = b.id and a.end_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY a.end_time ASC limit 5

select COALESCE(sum(a.cash_pay+a.electronic_pay),0) AS "total" , b.company_name AS "parkName" from order_tb a ,com_info_tb b where a.comid=b.id and a.end_time > #{end_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY a.comid, b.company_name ORDER BY total desc limit 10
select a.id parkid, a.company_name AS "parkName" from com_info_tb a where a.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select a.login_time logintime, a.beat_time beattime, a.local_id AS "localid" from park_token_tb a where a.park_id= #{parkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.login_time desc

select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.create_time AS "timemills", a.in_passid AS "inpass" from order_tb a where a.create_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.comid= #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.end_time is NULL ORDER BY a.create_time DESC limit 5

select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.end_time AS "timemills", a.out_passid AS "outpass" from order_tb a where a.end_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.comid = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY a.end_time ASC limit 5

select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.end_time AS "timemills", a.out_passid AS "outpass" from order_tb a where a.end_time > #{end_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.comid = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY a.end_time ASC limit 5
select a.nickname nickname from user_info_tb a where a.id= #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} limit 1
